item.title: Research
item.description: Most of the papers below have some connection to Witt vectors, but as of March 2022, I am making a concerted effort to branch out! Here is a link to my papers on arXiv. Publications On the de Rham-Witt complex over perfectoid rings, with Irakli Patchkoria. To appear in International Mathematics Research Notices. Version of March 21, 2021. On the p-typical de Rham-Witt complex over W(k). Alg. Number Th. 13 (2019) 1597-1631.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Email is always the best way to reach me: daviscj@uci.edu Office: Rowland Hall 440J Math Department main phone number: 949-824-5503 Mailing address: Rowland Hall 440J, UC Irvine, Irvine, CA 92697-3875
